content: The same goes for all old sports highlights to some degree — watch Babe Ruth take a step toward the pitcher while swinging. I’ve always been of the mind that given 50 years between, the old sports heroes could barely carry a modern athlete’s jock. We should celebrate the accomplishments of the past, but not for a minute should we believe that if you plugged in prime Oscar Robertson that he would do anything close to the same thing against athletes of today.
